Summary Note:
The RM first encountered Lemaire Lecomte at a golf tournament in Brussels. They played a round of golf together and discussed potential business ventures, which led to a strong professional relationship.
Having worked for over 40 years, Lemaire Lecomte brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in his decision to join.
Family Background: Lemaire Lecomte is currently divorced. His children are named Camille and Léa.
Education Background:
Lemaire received his secondary school diploma from Atheneum Brugge Centrum in 1981.
Lemaire pursued higher education at LUCA School of Arts, graduating in 1984.
Additionally, he went on to study at Vrije Universiteit Brussel until 1990.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 40 years, Lemaire Lecomte has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Lemaire Lecomte launched his career as a Assistant Designer at Walter Van Beirendonck BVBA, where he gained valuable experience from 1985 to 1989.
In 1989, he moved to Dries Van Noten NV to work as a Senior Designer, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
His tenure as a Creative Director at Ann Demeulemeester BVBA from 1995 to 1999 was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
He appointment as a Founder/Designer at Stella McCartney Belgium in 2001 marked a significant milestone in his career, as he took on increasingly complex challenges and delivered exceptional results.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 1020000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He owns townhouse in Liège, where he resides. It is worth 1206000 EUR.

He purchased condo in Sint-Niklaas, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 1030000 EUR.
On top of that he inherited a beautiful house in Mechelen, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 1790000 EUR.
He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Lemaire as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
